post.html:
You have reached the end of this course! Congratulations!!

Here are some suggestions on courses to take next. Or follow the lovely learning paths on Frontend Masters.

  • How to use a CLI, bash and Linux. Luckily for you I already have a course on it!.
  • How to use Git well. See Nina's coursea.
  • Deploy your code so you can see it from the web. I like Jem's course.
  • Learn some Node.js to understand how servers work. Scott's course is amazing.
  • Try a framework. Good ones to try are React (my course), Vue, Svelte, or Angular.
  • Take a computer science course (not now, but in the nearish future, have some practice before going here.) I have a course on that too.
post.title: Things to Do Next
